name: Brooklyn Sunrise
description: The name and color of this cocktail may bring to mind sunlight playing on the East River (or, if you prefer, the arguably more romantic Gowanus Canal). Whatever it evokes, it’s delicious — a bold but balanced blend of botanical flavors from floral gin, gentian liqueur and Aperol.
keywords: aperol, edible flower, gentian liqueur, gin

recipeInstructions.text: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a coupe. Garnish with an orange twist and flowers.
